## Description {#details}

Tracks register operand latency in cycles.

A read may be dependent on more than one write. This occurs when some writes only partially update the register associated to this read.

Definition at line 326 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
